00023 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00024 /// CStyleToolkit
00025 ///
00026 /// @description  This class is a singleton class which stores the style
00027 ///               information for how to display nodes, such as font, size,
00028 ///               etc.
00029 ///
00030 /// @limitations  None
00031 ///
00032 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00033 class CStyleToolkit
00034 {
00035 public:
00036     ~CStyleToolkit();
00037     static CStyleToolkit * instance();
00038     int    getBoldWidth() const;
00039     QBrush getBrush() const;
00040     QFont  getFont() const;
00041     QColor getNewColor() const;
00042     int    getNodeRadius() const;
00043     QPen   getPen() const;
00044 
00045  void loadDefaults();
00046 
00047     void setBoldWidth( int width );
00048     void setBrush( QBrush &brush );
00049     void setFont( QFont &font );
00050     void setNewColor( QColor &color );
00051     void setNodeRadius( int radius );
00052     void setPen( QPen &pen );
00053 
00054 private:
00055 
00056     //The constructor is made private to ensure that only a single instance
00057     //of the class can be created through the instance function.
00058     CStyleToolkit();
00059 
00060     //This variable stores the pen used to paint objects to the screen.
00061     QPen   m_pen;
00062 
00063     //This variable stores the color to be used while still creating objects.
00064     QColor m_newColor;
00065 
00066     //This variable stores the brush used to paint objects to the screen.
00067     QBrush m_brush;
00068 
00069     //This variable stores the font used to write text to the screen.
00070     QFont  m_font;
00071 
00072     //This variable stores the radius of the nodes.
00073     int    m_nodeRadius;
00074 
00075     //This variable stores the additional pen width for making nodes bold.
00076     int    m_boldWidth;
00077 };
00078 
00079 #endif /*_CSTYLETOOLKIT_H_*/
